title: Clone Ad Set for A/B Testing
description: A media buyer wants to test a new audience. They need to clone an existing ad set and change only the targeting.

tasks.description: Locate the original ad set in the campaign.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the correct ad set to be duplicated.
Agent successfully creates a copy of the ad set, including its ads.

tasks.description: In the new (cloned) ad set, change the audience targeting to the new test audience.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the targeting without changing the ad creative or other settings.
Both the original and the new test ad set are now running.
